title: Bug 4329 - No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 - No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations using the package view selection and dialog, the search is initialized with the fully qualified name. However, this does not yield any results.
EB: The search via package view selection and dialog should display results for declarations. It should first try to get the Java element and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Right-click and choose the search option from the context menu.
4. Enter a declaration name in the search dialog.
5. Press Enter or click the search button.
6. Observe that no results are displayed.

Expected: The search should display results for declarations related to the entered name or display the element name if no Java element is found.

NOTES:
